mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_perfume_cmt (i_p, i_user, cmt) VALUES (#{i_p}, #{i_user}, #{cmt})
mapper.select: SELECT A.i_cmt, B.i_user, B.nm, B.profile_img, A.cmt, C.val as gender, B.bd, A.m_dt FROM t_perfume_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user INNER JOIN c_code_d C ON B.gender = C.cd WHERE A.i_p = #{i_p} AND C.i_m = 1
